label: uncl2009
comment: Code relating terms to a reference date, time or period.

values.label: Reference date
values.comment: Payment terms related to reference date.

values.label: Before reference
values.comment: Payment terms related to time before reference date.

values.label: After reference
values.comment: Payment terms related to time after reference date.

values.label: End of 10-day period containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the ten day period containing the reference date.

values.label: End of 2-week period containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the two week period containing the reference date.

values.label: End of month containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the month containing the reference date.

values.label: End of the month following the month of reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the month following the month of reference date.

values.label: End of quarter containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the quarter containing the reference date.

values.label: End of year containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the year containing the reference date.

values.label: End of week containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the week containing the reference date.

values.label: End of ten day period following month after reference date's month
values.comment: Payment terms are 10 days after the end of the referenced month.

values.label: End of half year containing the reference date
values.comment: End of the half year in which the referred date falls.

values.label: From reference
values.comment: Payment terms related to a time inclusive of and after a reference date.

values.label: End of 15-day period containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms are at the end of the 15-day period containing the reference date.

values.label: On or before reference
values.comment: Payment terms are on or before.

values.label: Whichever is first, the 15th or last day of the month following the payment terms period
values.comment: The payment terms are at, whichever is first, the 15th or the last day of the month following the payment terms period (payment terms period = period of time between the reference date and the theoretical due date).

values.label: After end of month containing the reference date
values.comment: Payment terms related to a time after the end of the month containing the reference date.
